An AI document extraction & content anal: 一个 AI 文档提取和内容分析平台，将非结构化文件 (PDF, 图像, URL 等) 转换为结构化数据。
Enter your Extracta-ai API key: 输入你的 Extracta-ai API 密钥
Upload a file and immediately receive ex: 上传文件并立即接收提取的内容
从提取中获取成功的数据。注意：API建议在请求之间延迟2秒，以避免限制频率。
The file to upload for extraction. Suppo: 要上传的文件进行提取。支持：PDF，图像 (JPEG，PNG，TIFF，BMP)，Word docs (DOC，DOCX)，文本文件 (TXT)
Document's language for accurate extract: 文档的准确提取语言。Extracta.ai 支持多种语言，使用高级的 AI 算法来解析语言的细微差别。
Define the data fields you want to extra: 定义您想要从文档提取的数据字段
Whether the document contains charts, gr: 文档是否包含图表、图表或图表
Whether to recognize checkboxes and thei: 是否识别复选框及其状态
Enable for very large or complex documen: 为非常大或复杂的文档启用
Treat each PDF page as a separate extrac: 将每个PDF页面视为一个单独的提取单元
Extract only a specified range of pages: 只提取指定的页面范围
Starting page number (required if Specif: 起始页号 (启用特定页面处理时需要)
Ending page number (required if Specific: 结束页面编号(启用特定页面处理时需要)
Document file to upload (PDF, images, et: 要上传的文档文件 (PDF, 图像等)
The ID of the batch to add files to (opt: 要将文件添加到批处理的 ID (可选)。如果没有提供，将创建一个新批。
The ID of the file (optional). If provid: 文件的 ID (可选)。如果提供了，过滤结果只对该文件有效。
Triggers when a document extraction is s: 成功处理文档提取时触发.
Triggers when a document extraction fail: 当文档提取失败时触发.
\nTo use this trigger, you need to manua:
To use this trigger, you need to manually set up a single webhook endpoint in your Extracta.ai account. This endpoint will receive all events, and Activepieces will filter for the correct one.

1.  **Login** to your Extracta.ai dashboard.
2.  Navigate to the **API** section from the side menu.
3.  Scroll down to **Webhook Settings**.
4.  Click **"Create a new webhook"** (or edit an existing one).
5.  Paste the following URL into the **Endpoint URL** field:
    ```text
    {{webhookUrl}}
    ```
6.  Click **Save**.

This single webhook will now send all events to Activepieces. This trigger will only activate for the **'extraction.failed'** event.
